name: Guardian Kirin
originalText:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Guardian Kirin.

rulings.text: If Guardian Kirin and another creature you control die simultaneously (perhaps because they were both attacking or blocking), Guardian Kirin won't be on the battlefield as its triggered ability resolves. It can't be saved by the +1/+1 counter that would have been put on it.
